articles.title: Astronomers provide 'field guide' to exoplanets known as hot Jupiters - Nanowerk
articles.description: By combining Hubble Space Telescope observations with theoretical models, a team of astronomers has gained insights into the chemical and physical makeup of a variety of exoplanets known as hot Jupiters.

articles.title: Moscow is going back into lockdown as Covid-19 deaths multiply in Russia - CNN
articles.description: Moscow will impose a 10-day lockdown from next week in an effort to curb soaring Covid-19 cases, the city's mayor has said, as Russia endures its worst-ever phase of the pandemic.
